Summary: It flew quickly, then turned, then hovered. There was then a bright light and appeared to be another ufo but with red lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in a car heading home. I saw the object in the air heading away from us diagonally. It then turned in the direction that we were headed. As we went down a winding road we saw it hovering over a small field. I was very excited when I saw it. We turned around and it flew overhead then we lost track of it.
